activities: ProductPlan provides product/strategy roadmap building software for hundreds of organizations. When signing up for the service a user provides their Organization, Name, Phone (optionally) and Email. When purchasing our third party PCI-DSS Level 1 compliant partner stores customer billing information, including credit card details. ProductPlan (or its partners) does not engage in any activities related to sharing, selling, trading or disclosing personally identifiable information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Name, Phone (optional), Email, Billing information (Name, Billing Address, Email Address, Credit Card)
